name: Pub Simulator V1
description:
I was missing nights in the pub with friends during lockdown so I decided to make a twine game around having a nice quite night with friends.

I've never used twine before so have likely made some mistakes here or there, but plan to iterate on it over time.

Also there are a good few spelling errors which I hope to remedy. Hopefully I'll add more paths etc. when I get a chance.
